Class Adventurer

java.lang.Object
Adventurer
public class Adventurer
extends java.lang.Object
Class that contains information, statistics, and inventory for the player character.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Adventurer​(java.lang.String name)
    Adventurer constructor creates a level 1 adventurer.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Adventurer

      public Adventurer​(java.lang.String name) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Adventurer constructor creates a level 1 adventurer.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the adventurer
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if passed a null string as a name.
      Since:
      1.2

  • Method Details

    • levelCheck

      public boolean levelCheck()
      Checks if the player needs to level up, and performs the level up operation if appropriate. Returns a boolean of if the player leveled up to allow generation of appropriate text output.
      Returns:
      If the player levels up.
      Since:
      1.7

    • getCurrentXP

      public int getCurrentXP()
      Returns the current XP of the player. Added for combat troubleshooting.
      Returns:
      The player's current XP.
      Since:
      1.7

    • addXP

      public void addXP​(int XP)
      Adds XP to the the player.
      Parameters:
      XP - The xp to add to the player's total.
      Since:
      1.7

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Get the adventurer's current health.
      Returns:
      The adventurer's health
      Since:
      1.3

    • getMaxHealth

      public int getMaxHealth()
      Accessor to return the player's max possible health for the current level.
      Returns:
      The maximum health capacity of the player
      Since:
      1.6

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage​(int damage)
      Deal damage to the adventurer by reducing health.
      Parameters:
      damage - The damage to deal to the player
      Since:
      1.3

    • heal

      public void heal​(int points)
      Heal the adventurer for a certain number of points.
      Parameters:
      points - The number of points to heal
      Since:
      1.3

    • attack

      public int attack​(int d20Roll)
      Determines the hitliness of the attack considering chance, player strength, and and the current weapon equipped.
      Parameters:
      d20Roll - The result of a d20 roll
      Returns:
      The total hit number of the attack, to be compared against monster AC.
      Since:
      1.5

    • giveDamage

      public int giveDamage​(int d20Roll)
      Determines the damage done by a successful attack. Considers critical hits, as well as current weapon that is equipped.
      Parameters:
      d20Roll - The result of a d20 roll.
      Returns:
      The amount of damage to deal to the monster.
      Since:
      1.7

    • getAC

      public int getAC()
      Returns the player's current AC.
      Returns:
      The player's armor class.
      Since:
      1.7

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Standard toString method, returns the adventurers name only.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the name of the adventurer.
      Since:
      1.6

    • getEquippedArmor

      public Armor getEquippedArmor()
      Accessor to return a pointer to the current armor that the adventurer has equipped.
      Returns:
      Currently equipped armor.
      Since:
      1.6

    • getEquippedWeapon

      public Weapon getEquippedWeapon()
      Accessor to return a pointer to the current weapon that the adventurer is wielding.
      Returns:
      The weapon that is equipped.
      Since:
      1.6

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Accessor to determine the player's current level. Used for ambient content generation.
      Returns:
      The adventurer's current level.
      Since:
      1.6

    • setCombat

      public void setCombat​(boolean combatStatus)
      Sets the combat state flag of the player when in the presence of a monster.
      Parameters:
      combatStatus - Whether or not the player is in combat.
      Since:
      1.7

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth​(int newHealth)
      Sets the player's health the given value.
      Parameters:
      newHealth - The value to set the player's health to.
      Since:
      1.7

    • getInvestigation

      public int getInvestigation()
      Returns the player's current investigation score. Used when searching for loot.
      Returns:
      The player's investigation score.
      Since:
      1.8

    • improveInvestigation

      public boolean improveInvestigation()
      Method to get better at investigating. Each time the player searches, there is a 50% chance that they get better at searching.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the player got better at investigating.
      Since:
      1.8

    • getInventory

      public java.util.List<Item> getInventory()
      Accessor to get a pointer to the player's inventory.
      Returns:
      A pointer to the player's inventory.
      Since:
      1.8

    • inCombat

      public boolean inCombat()
      Returns whether the player is in combat or not. Mainly used in inventory operations.
      Returns:
      Whether the player is in combat.
      Since:
      1.8

    • setArmor

      public void setArmor​(Armor freshDigs)
      Equips new armor to the player.
      Parameters:
      freshDigs - The new piece of armor to equip.
      Since:
      1.8

    • setWeapon

      public void setWeapon​(Weapon freshTools)
      Equips a new weapon to the player.
      Parameters:
      freshTools - The weapon to be equipped.
      Since:
      1.8
